name: AMaze (itch) (Raven Insights, UncommonSenseGames)
description:
AMaze (working title) is an atmospheric maze solving/puzzle game from a first person perspective. The maze is randomly generated and has multiple floors. The player must find the exit which is on the top of the maze. 

Currently, this is just a prototype demo, so the levels are premade and not randomly generated as you play. We plan to change that in a later version (but the algorithm needs to be optimized) to maximize replayability.

This demo is made as our final project for the Unity/C# education of the "PISMO" incubator in Novska, HR. Team members and roles are:

QA : Dominik Cvetkovski;

Level designer : Mario Marić;

Algorithm genius : Tibor Krleža;

The power that be : Renato Lovreković;

Seeing as this is our minimal viable game, we're really hoping to get as much player feedback as possible, so don't hesitate to tell us anything you would like us to know!
